greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of Sum_{n>=1} 1/(prime(n)*prime(n+1)*prime(n+2)): Sum of reciprocals of products of three successive primes.
comment: Since p(n+1) > p(n) and p(n+2) > p(n), p(n)*p(n+1)*p(n+2) > p(n)^3 and 1/[p(n)*p(n+1)*p(n+2)] < 1/p(n)^3. Because Sum_{n>=1} 1/p(n)^3 = A085541 converges, Sum_{n>=1} 1/(p(n)*p(n+1)*p(n+2)) converges, too.
results.author: _Timothy Varghese_, May 06 2014
ext: Offset corrected by and more terms from _Jon E. Schoenfield_, Mar 21 2021
